entries.source:
Chat Edit: 'in my features engineer, I thinkw e should include Rogers  Satchel vol.  Also do we have a trend strength featue? e.g         # 2. Calculate the "Backward" Z-Score
        # How big was the move over the LAST 12 hours relative to volatility?
        
        backward_return = np.log(X['c'] / X['c'].shift(12))
        volatility = box_std # From RS calculation
        
        # This is a POWERFUL Input Feature
        X['trend_strength_12h'] = backward_return / (volatility * np.sqrt(12))'
